item.title: All 474 Animations -- Refactored Clients Only
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:4, topic:340859”]i get an unpacking error…

Yes ive packed his seq.dat into config.jag and yes im using galkons refactored 474 lookalike

EDIT: fixed the unpacking error, now when i login i get a nullpointerexception.
to me it looks like you havent refactored everything[/quote]

No, you have to edit some of the old animation_sub files. Also, you need to modify some stuff in your class36. I just released the code for animation.java, that’s it, nothing else

item.title: All 474 Animations -- Refactored Clients Only
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Well, Here it is.

import java.io.PrintStream;
import sign.signlink;

public class Animation
{

    public static void unpackConfig(StreamLoader streamloader)
    {
        Stream stream = new Stream(streamloader.getDataForName("seq.dat"));
        anInt350 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
        if(anims == null)
            anims = new Animation[anInt350];
        for(int j = 0; j < anInt350; j++)
        {
            if(anims[j] == null)
                anims[j] = new Animation();
            anims[j].readValues(stream);
        }
    }

    public int method258(int i)
    {
        int j = anIntArray355[i];
        if(j != -39)
        {
            for(int k = 1; k > 0; k++);
        }
        if(j == 0)
        {
            Class36 class36 = Class36.method531(anIntArray353[i]);
            if(class36 != null)
                j = anIntArray355[i] = class36.anInt636;
        }
        if(j == 0)
            j = 1;
        return j;
    }

    public void readValues(Stream stream)
    {
                do {
                        anInt360 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                        if(anInt360 == 65535)
                           anInt360 = -1;
                        anInt361 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                        if(anInt361 == 65535)
                           anInt361 = -1;
                        anInt356 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                        anInt359 = stream.readUnsignedByte();
                        anInt362 = stream.readUnsignedByte();
                        anInt363 = stream.readUnsignedByte();
                        anInt364 = stream.readUnsignedByte();
                        anInt365 = stream.readUnsignedByte();
                        anInt366 = stream.readDWord();
                          anInt352 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                        anIntArray353 = new int[anInt352];
                        anIntArray354 = new int[anInt352];
                        anIntArray355 = new int[anInt352];
                        for(int i=0; i < anInt352; i++)
                          anIntArray353[i] = stream.readDWord();
                        for(int i=0; i < anInt352; i++)
                          anIntArray354[i] = -1;
                        for(int i=0; i < anInt352; i++)
                          anIntArray355[i] = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                        break;
                } while(true);
    }

    public Animation()
    {
        anInt348 = 9;
        aBoolean349 = false;
        anInt356 = -1;
        aBoolean358 = false;
        anInt359 = 5;
        anInt360 = -1;
        anInt361 = -1;
        anInt362 = 99;
        anInt363 = -1;
        anInt364 = -1;
        anInt365 = 2;
    }

    private int anInt348;
    private boolean aBoolean349;
    public static int anInt350;
    public static Animation anims[];
    public int anInt352;
    public int anIntArray353[];
    public int anIntArray354[];
    private int anIntArray355[];
    public int anInt356;
    public int anIntArray357[];
    public boolean aBoolean358;
    public int anInt359;
    public int anInt360;
    public int anInt361;
    public int anInt362;
    public int anInt363;
    public int anInt364;
    public int anInt365;
    public int anInt366;
    public static int anInt367;
}
